verbs.description: sweet corn creme brulee [ARG0: the starch in corn] [V: acts] [ARG1: as a natural thickener for this dessert] and adds an extra sweetness the caramelized sugar crust and fruit garnish make for a lovely presentation —maryanne jensen - gowan pelham new hampshire sweet corn
